title: Ambient scalable fabrication of high-performance flexible perovskite solar cells
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE02925A, Paper
Pengchi Liu, Hui Wang, Tianqi Niu, Lei Yin, Yachao Du, Lei Lang, Zheng Zhang, Yongchao Tu, Xiujie Liu, Xin Chen, Shuang Wang, Nan Wu, Ru Qin, Likun Wang, Shaoan Yang, Chunfu Zhang, Xu Pan, Shengzhong (Frank) Liu, Kui Zhao
Ionic-liquid mediated scalable ambient-printing for efficient perovskite solar modules to achieve wearable electronic integration.
